name: GHU Game Jam Submission: Troll Squad Booty Run
name_original: GHU Game Jam Submission: Troll Squad Booty Run
description:
TROLL SQUAD BOOTY RUN

1-4 players. Keyboard and Gamepads are supported. 

Make sure gamepads are connected before starting the game.

CONTROLS

Keyboard:

"Enter" to join.

"W, A, S, D" to move.

"E" to drive/cancel driving wagon when standing close to the front.

"Space" to attack.

Gamepad:

"Start" to join.

"Left Stick" to move.

"Y" to to drive/cancel driving wagon when standing close to the front.

"X" to attack.

Make sure to avoid obstacles on the road and get those pesky attackers off of your wagon!

CREDITS

Programming: Oskar Wahlström

Music & Sound: Per Fransson

Graphics: Daniel Olofsson, Leo Papworth, Olov Engman

Game Design: All of the above.
